snippet: She is an Orthodox Jew. They are black men accused of sexual assault and forced prostitution. After that, nothing is clear.
abstract: Prosecutors are struggling to untangle a criminal case centered around a Jewish girl who says she was sexually assaulted and forced into prostitution by four local black men in Crown Heights, Brooklyn; defendants Damien Crooks, Darrell Dula, Jamalai Brockett and Jawara Brockett claim that their accuser, who has a history of mental illness, was herself a kind of predator.

byline.original: By ALAN FEUER and COLIN MOYNIHAN

lead_paragraph: She is an Orthodox Jew. They are black men accused of sexual assault and forced prostitution. After that, nothing is clear.

headline.seo: Untangling a Rape Case in Crown Heights
headline.main: Untangling a Rape Case in Crown Heights
headline.print_headline: Untangling a Rape Case in Crown Heights
